description: Triggers a job to export a segment to a specified destination.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: SegmentDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the segment definition used in this snapshot request.

parameters.name: DataFormat
parameters.description: The format in which the segment will be exported.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the segment snapshot.
